LanguageData.TWB_BreweryMini.label: tiny brewery
LanguageData.TWB_BreweryMini.description: A tiny work station with all the equipment needed to mix wort for beer production. Wort must be fermented to finally become beer.
LanguageData.TWB_DrugLabMini.label: tiny drug lab
LanguageData.TWB_DrugLabMini.description: A tiny work bench equipped with various containers, heaters, and measurement equipment for producing a variety of drugs.
LanguageData.TWB_ElectricSmelterMini.label: tiny electric smelter
LanguageData.TWB_ElectricSmelterMini.description: Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items. Consumes a lot of power.
LanguageData.TWB_ElectricSmithyMini.label: tiny electric smithy
LanguageData.TWB_ElectricSmithyMini.description: A tiny electric-powered station equipped for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.TWB_ElectricStoveMini.label: tiny electric stove
LanguageData.TWB_ElectricStoveMini.description: A tiny electrically-powered stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.TWB_ElectricTailoringBenchMini.label: tiny electric tailor bench
LanguageData.TWB_ElectricTailoringBenchMini.descripti: A tiny workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes.
LanguageData.TWB_FueledSmithyMini.label: tiny fueled smithy
LanguageData.TWB_FueledSmithyMini.description: A tiny wood-fueled station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.TWB_FueledStoveMini.label: tiny fueled stove
LanguageData.TWB_FueledStoveMini.description: A tiny wood-fueled stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.TWB_HandTailoringBenchMini.label: tiny hand tailor bench
LanguageData.TWB_HandTailoringBenchMini.description: A tiny workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes.
LanguageData.TWB_NutrientPasteDispenser.label: tiny nutrient paste dispenser
LanguageData.TWB_NutrientPasteDispenser.description: A tiny machine that synthesizes edible nutrient paste from organic feedstocks placed in adjacent hoppers. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay.
LanguageData.TWB_SimpleResearchBenchMini.label: tiny simple research bench
LanguageData.TWB_SimpleResearchBenchMini.description: A tiny simple bench with writing implements and simple measurement devices. Researchers work here to discover new things.
LanguageData.TWB_TableButcherMini.label: tiny butcher table
LanguageData.TWB_TableButcherMini.description: A tiny table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.
LanguageData.TWB_TableMachiningMini.label: tiny machining table
LanguageData.TWB_TableMachiningMini.description: A tiny work station for assembling and disassembling machinery such as guns or mechanoid corpses.
LanguageData.TWB_TableSculptingMini.label: tiny art bench
LanguageData.TWB_TableSculptingMini.description: A tiny workbench equipped for creating art.
LanguageData.TWB_TableStonecutterMini.label: tiny stonecutter's table
LanguageData.TWB_TableStonecutterMini.description: A tiny work table equipped to cut rough stone into usable blocks.
